question: Bawangaja (Chool Giri) is an important Jain pilgrimage centre locate in which district of Madhya Pradesh?
explanation: Bawangaja (Chool Giri) is an important Jain pilgrimage centre located in Barwani district of Madhya Pradesh.It is 6 Kms from district headquarter Barwani.There are total of 11 temples located over the hill which belong to 15th century. It has worldâ€™s tallest statue of Lord Adinathji.
